snippet: Mitt Romney said that during his tenure at Bain Capital, a private equity firm, he helped create 100,000 jobs, but documenting a "net" gain of that size is extremely difficult.
abstract: Mitt Romney said that during his tenure at Bain Capital, a private equity firm, he helped create 100,000 jobs, but documenting a "net" gain of that size is extremely difficult.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mitt Romney said that during his tenure at Bain Capital, a private equity firm, he helped create 100,000 jobs, even when layoffs from downsized firms are factored in.
